channel.title: Tradeing with shops error
channel.description:
when i trade 3/5 shops i have on my server they will disconnect me for some odd reason
[code]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- -
- starting Server -
- -
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Starting Rs Related on 0.0.0.0:55555 ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:1841 Client type: high memory version UserId: 82128902 shamon king is signing onto server. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -56 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15774) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15061) at client.process(client.java:15032) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:55) Rs Related Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player shamon king ClientHandler: Client shamon king disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:1842 Client type: high memory version UserId: 82128902 shamon king is signing onto server. [/code]
this is what i have for the one shop [code]} else if (NPCID == 521 || NPCID == 520 || NPCID == 524 || NPCID == 525) { // PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 4; // [/code]
i dont think i have any errors in their. the first to npcs will work but the others wont?
same with to other sperate shops.
can anyone please help me out here?

item.title: Tradeing with shops error
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

ive searched rune-server didnt find 1 tut on how to fix
must be something people keep to their selfs like the npcs walk through wall :mad:
